```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(visdat)
library(DataExplorer)
library(skimr)

```



### Read Data


```{r}
data <- read_csv(here("processed/GTI_2012-2021.csv"))
```


### Explore Data


```{r}
glimpse(data)

```



```{r}
head(data)
```



```{r}
data %>%
  group_by(year, ranking) %>%
  tally()
```




```{r}
summary(data)
```


```{r}
data %>%
  arrange(desc(year)) %>%
  vis_dat()
```


```{r}
data %>%
  get_dupes()
```



```{r}
data %>%
  skim()
```


```{r}
create_report(data)
```
